content:
I think I want to honor my friend's memory by living more authentically and true to myself. They always encouraged me to take risks and pursue my passions, and I feel like I've been holding back lately. I want to start taking small steps towards doing things that scare me and make me come alive.

I also want to continue to support others who are going through tough times, just like my friend was always there for me. I feel like that's a way to keep their spirit of kindness and compassion alive.

Lastly, I want to create a memory book or scrapbook with pictures and mementos from our time together. I think that will help me process my emotions and remember the good times we had.

It's funny, I was thinking about how my friend always used to make me laugh, and I realized that I haven't laughed as much since they've been gone. I want to make a conscious effort to find joy and humor in life again, even in the tough times
